mapper.sql: id, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, code, name, subjection, educationLevel, property, type, url, address, contactPhone, entranceIntro, universityIntro, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, batchType
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_university ( createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, code, name, subjection, educationLevel, property, type, url, address, contactPhone, entranceIntro, universityIntro, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, batchType ) VALUES ( #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{code}, #{name}, #{subjection}, #{educationLevel}, #{property}, #{type}, #{url}, #{address}, #{contactPhone}, #{entranceIntro}, #{universityIntro}, #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{countyId}, #{countyName}, #{batchType} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_university
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
subjection = #{subjection},
educationLevel = #{educationLevel},
property = #{property},
type = #{type},
url = #{url},
address = #{address},
contactPhone = #{contactPhone},
entranceIntro = #{entranceIntro},
universityIntro = #{universityIntro},
provinceId = #{provinceId},
provinceName = #{provinceName},
cityId = #{cityId},
cityName = #{cityName},
countyId = #{countyId},
countyName = #{countyName},
batchType = #{batchType},
WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_university ( createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, code, name, subjection, educationLevel, property, type, url, address, contactPhone, entranceIntro, universityIntro, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, batchType ) VALUES ( #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.code}, #{map.name}, #{map.subjection}, #{map.educationLevel}, #{map.property}, #{map.type}, #{map.url}, #{map.address}, #{map.contactPhone}, #{map.entranceIntro}, #{map.universityIntro}, #{map.provinceId}, #{map.provinceName}, #{map.cityId}, #{map.cityName}, #{map.countyId}, #{map.countyName}, #{map.batchType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_university
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND subjection like CONCAT('%', #{subjection} , '%')
AND educationLevel like CONCAT('%', #{educationLevel} , '%')
AND property like CONCAT('%', #{property} , '%')
AND type like CONCAT('%', #{type} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{url} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{address} , '%')
AND contactPhone like CONCAT('%', #{contactPhone} , '%')
AND entranceIntro like CONCAT('%', #{entranceIntro} , '%')
AND universityIntro like CONCAT('%', #{universityIntro} , '%')
AND provinceId like CONCAT('%', #{provinceId} , '%')
AND provinceName like CONCAT('%', #{provinceName} , '%')
AND cityId like CONCAT('%', #{cityId} , '%')
AND cityName like CONCAT('%', #{cityName} , '%')
AND countyId like CONCAT('%', #{countyId} , '%')
AND countyName like CONCAT('%', #{countyName} , '%')
AND batchType like CONCAT('%', #{batchType} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}

select '文科' as subjectName, wsPlanNumber as planNumber,wsEnrollNumber as enrollNumber,wsHighestScore as highestScore, wsHighestRank as highestRank,wsLowestScore as lowestScore,wsLowestRank as lowestRank,wsAverageScore as averageScore, wsAverageRank as averageRank from gk_enroll_report where universityCode=#{code} and year=#{year}
union all select '理工' as subjectName, lgPlanNumber as planNumber,lgEnrollNumber as enrollNumber,lgHighestScore as highestScore, lgHighestRank as highestRank,lgLowestScore as lowestScore,lgLowestRank as lowestRank,lgAverageScore as averageScore, lgAverageRank as averageRank from gk_enroll_report where universityCode=#{code} and year=#{year}
select entranceIntro from gk_university where 1=1 and code=#{code} limit 0,1
select universityIntro from gk_university where 1=1 and code=#{code} limit 0,1
